title: The Wolfpack
description:
Tig and Cheryl laugh their way through "The Wolfpack," (or "Woofpack"?!), a doc about a family of six boys raised in a New York City apartment they are only rarely allowed to leave. Tig gives a shoutout to "My Octopus Teacher" winning an Oscar, Cheryl makes a declaration on the subject of tank tops vs sleeveless shirts, and "who are you attracted to" proves to be a more challenging question than usual! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
